mapper.select: SELECT /* RegisterUserInfoList */ USER_ID AS "userID" , ROLE_ID AS "roleID" , SPEC_ID AS "specificID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" , FRST_LOGIN_DT AS "firstLoginDate" , LAST_LOGIN_DT AS "lastLoginDate" , SEC_KEY AS "secretKey" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE (FRST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR LAST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR NICK_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR PHONE ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{roleID}, '') OR ROLE_ID = #{roleID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') OR STCD = #{statusCode}) ORDER BY (FRST_NM,LAST_NM) ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE (FRST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR LAST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR NICK_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR PHONE ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{roleID}, '') OR ROLE_ID = #{roleID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') OR STCD = #{statusCode})

SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoDetail */ USER_ID AS "userID" , ROLE_ID AS "roleID" , SPEC_ID AS "specificID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" , FRST_LOGIN_DT AS "firstLoginDate" , LAST_LOGIN_DT AS "lastLoginDate" , SEC_KEY AS "secretKey" , PASSWD_ERR_CT AS "userPasswordErrorCount" , LOCK_DT AS "lockDateTime" , LOGIN_BY_USER_YN AS "loginByUserYn" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userID} AND STCD <> '09'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateUserInfoDetail */ FRST.USER_INFO SET PASSWD_ERR_CT = COALESCE(#{userPasswordErrorCount}, PASSWD_ERR_CT) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LOCK_DT = COALESCE(#{lockDateTime}, LOCK_DT) , FRST_LOGIN_DT = COALESCE(#{firstLoginDate}, FRST_LOGIN_DT) , LAST_LOGIN_DT = COALESCE(#{lastLoginDate}, LAST_LOGIN_DT) , SPEC_ID = COALESCE(#{specificID}, SPEC_ID) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE USER_ID = #{userID} AND ROLE_ID = #{roleID} AND STCD <> '09'

INSERT /* registerUserInfoDetail */ INTO FRST.USER_INFO ( USER_ID , ROLE_ID , SPEC_ID , FRST_NM , LAST_NM , NICK_NM , GENDER , DOB , POB , ADDR , PHONE , EMAIL , PASSWD , IMG_URL , SEC_KEY , FRST_LOGIN_DT , LAST_LOGIN_DT , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{userID} , #{roleID} , COALESCE(#{specificID}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstName}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastName}, '') , COALESCE(#{nickname}, '') , COALESCE(#{gender}, '') , COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{address}, '') , COALESCE(#{phone}, '') , COALESCE(#{email}, '') , COALESCE(#{passwd}, '') , COALESCE(#{imageUrl}, '') , COALESCE(#{secretKey}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstLoginDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastLoginDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
